[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1703318073661{margin-top: -200px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” el_class=”shadow-box”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]Where Living Meets Solutions[vc_column_text]

AV Racks

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

An AV rack, also known as an equipment rack or AV cabinet, is a piece of furniture designed to house and organize audio-visual components in a centralized location. These racks typically hold devices like amplifiers, AV receivers, media players, cable boxes, and other electronics necessary for a home entertainment system. They help manage cables, provide ventilation, and often have features for easy access and maintenance of the AV equipment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1534249300597{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 80px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background: #f5f5f5 url(https://futuretechliving.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/vertical-lines-3.png?id=10096) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”animate”][vc_media_grid element_width=”3″ gap=”0″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1704352871403-11c30a8587e18def2f270c1444bf420f-2″ include=”13812,13813,13814,13816″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1534249583449{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column]

Nicole Pratt

Team Member

Highly recommend their service!

When my husband and I were looking for a new media wall design, we knew it had to be Future Tech Living Solutions. They created the most modern design that can blend in with any surrounding. The installation process was seamless and they really made our old house feel brand new. Highly recommend their service!

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
